traffic_growth.title: Traffic Growth
traffic_growth.description: Your traffic grew by {delta}% in this period.
traffic_growth.detail: You had {value} total clicks, representing significant growth compared to the previous period.

traffic_decline.title: Traffic Decline
traffic_decline.description: Traffic decreased by {delta}% compared to the previous period.
traffic_decline.detail: {value} clicks recorded. Consider reviewing your distribution and promotion strategies.

traffic_spike.title: Traffic Spike Detected
traffic_spike.description: An unusual spike of {value} clicks was detected.
traffic_spike.detail: On {date}, there was a {delta}% increase over the daily average. This may indicate viral content or a successful campaign.

geo_concentration.title: Geographic Concentration
geo_concentration.detail: Your audience is highly concentrated in {country}. Consider specific strategies for this market or explore opportunities in other regions.

geo_diversification.title: Diversified Audience
geo_diversification.description: Your audience is distributed across {value} different countries.
geo_diversification.detail: You have an international presence with significant traffic from multiple countries. This indicates healthy global reach.

geo_emerging.title: Emerging Market
geo_emerging.detail: {country} is becoming a major traffic source. Consider creating content specifically for this audience.

performance_high_engagement.title: High Engagement
performance_high_engagement.detail: Your links are performing excellently with {avgClicks} clicks per link on average. Your content resonates well with your audience.

performance_low_engagement.title: Low Engagement
performance_low_engagement.detail: With {activeLinks} active links, engagement is low. Consider optimizing your titles, descriptions, or distribution strategy.

performance_top_link.title: Top Link
performance_top_link.detail: This link has generated {clicks} clicks. Analyze what makes this content successful and replicate that strategy.

temporal_peak_day.title: Peak Day Identified
temporal_peak_day.detail: {dayName}s are your strongest day. Consider scheduling important content or campaigns on this day.

temporal_weekend_peak.title: Active Weekends
temporal_weekend_peak.detail: Weekend average: {weekendAvg} clicks vs {weekdayAvg} on weekdays. Your audience is more active on weekends.

temporal_weekday_peak.title: Active Work Week
temporal_weekday_peak.detail: Weekday average: {weekdayAvg} clicks vs {weekendAvg} on weekends. Your audience is more active during the week.

device_dominance.title: Device Dominance
device_dominance.detail: Most of your audience uses {device}. Optimize your experience for this device.

source_concentration.title: Concentrated Source
source_concentration.detail: You rely heavily on {source}. Consider diversifying your distribution channels to reduce risk.

source_diversification.title: Diversified Sources
source_diversification.detail: You have good channel diversification. This reduces the risk of depending on a single platform.
